common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: This API supports publishing an existing item from the mart shop to an outlet shop.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The item ID of the product in the Mart shop to be published to the outlet shop.

","name":"mart_item_id","sample":"","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"KDsfyGQ"},{"description":"

The shop ID of the outlet shop where the product will be published.



","name":"outlet_shop_id","sample":"","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"hGffjGm"},{"description":"

Configuration details for publishing the product to the outlet shop, including model mapping, pricing, stock, logistics, and purchase limits.

","name":"publish_item","sample":"","type":"object","required":"True","key":"rJbWTYr","children":[{"description":"","name":"outlet_item_id","sample":"","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"xtEFpTj"},{"description":"

A list of models to be published to the outlet shop, mapped from the corresponding Mart shop models.


","name":"model","sample":"","type":"object","required":"False","key":"ddzwbDB","children":[{"description":"

The model ID in the Mart shop that this outlet model is associated with.

model_id=0 for items with only the default model(no variations)

","name":"relate_mart_model_id","sample":"","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"ppCcFRi"},{"description":"

The status of model.

","name":"model_status","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"QNAFiTh"},{"description":"

The original price of the model.

","name":"original_price","sample":"","type":"float","required":"False","key":"sWGsNaQ"},{"description":"

Stock information for the model, set in outlet sku level.

","name":"seller_stock","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":"False","key":"QEmNTbQ","children":[{"description":"

The location ID where the stock is stored.


","name":"location_id","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"drcBQKt"},{"description":"

The available stock quantity for the model.


","name":"stock","sample":"","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"snPxrSr"}]},{"description":"

set in outlet sku level

","name":"pre_order","sample":"","type":"object","required":"False","key":"cMWtphW","children":[{"description":"

Indicates whether the model is sold as a pre-order item.

","name":"is_pre_order","sample":"","type":"boolean","required":"True","key":"izNTnBj"},{"description":"

The number of days required to ship the item after an order is placed.

","name":"days_to_ship","sample":"","type":"int32","required":"False","key":"YExHQmQ"}]}]},{"description":"

Logistic channel setting; can set for each outlet shop.

","name":"logistic_info","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":"False","key":"yfERThE","children":[{"description":"

The logistics channel ID used for shipping the item.


","name":"logistic_id","sample":"","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"DPwSnih"},{"description":"

Indicates whether the logistics channel is enabled for the item.


","name":"enabled","sample":"","type":"boolean","required":"True","key":"cazRPWn"},{"description":"

The shipping fee charged to the buyer for this logistics channel.


","name":"shipping_fee","sample":"","type":"float","required":"False","key":"ZCYBCeX"},{"description":"

The parcel size ID used to calculate shipping fees. 


","name":"size_id","sample":"","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"DizEHDM"},{"description":"

Indicates whether free shipping is applied for this logistics channel.

","name":"is_free","sample":"","type":"boolean","required":"False","key":"ZscdiTY"}]},{"description":"

Purchase quantity limits applied to the item in the outlet shop.

","name":"purchase_limit_info","sample":"","type":"object","required":"False","key":"ZsZyixR","children":[{"description":"

The minimum quantity that a buyer is allowed to purchase per order.


","name":"min_purchase_limit","sample":"","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"dHAhcJp"},{"description":"

The maximum purchase quantity configuration for the item.


","name":"max_purchase_limit","sample":"","type":"object","required":"True","key":"tFNxQnR","children":[{"description":"

The maximum quantity that a buyer is allowed to purchase per order.

","name":"purchase_limit","sample":"","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"BkReWTb"}]}]}]}],"response_params":[{"name":"message","type":"string","sample":"","description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","key":"TCXcxYR"},{"description":"

Warning message.

","name":"warning","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"wfcaYNx"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"wwBSbTS"},{"description":"","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"YimQsTz","children":[{"description":"

The outlet item ID.

","name":"item_id","sample":"","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"FsxYWF"}]}]}
